website_summaries.verdict: Nice starter kit for kids wanting to learn magic. Many simple tricks, so not really aimed at older children.
pros: Offers access to a website with additional tricks and instructions
Most tricks are easy to learn, but several are advanced for older kids
Good collection of tricks will keep kids entertained for hours
cons: Younger kids will probably need some help
Long-term quality of parts is questionable

customer_reviews.title: Really great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter is interested in magic tricks and bought this with a gift card. It is awesome and well worth the money! The tricks are quality and good for kids to be able to perform. It’s easy for her and she is 11 and it’s good quality so it does not feel like a childish trick when she shows us. Really well done!!
customer_reviews.author: MiquiMom

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect gift for a beginning magician.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my 8 year old Grand daughter. She loves it. It has everything in the box that she could possibly need to give a fantastic magic show and we have already had three shows. She is thrilled. It is easily a perfect gift for anyone who is trying to learn slight of hand but I would not hesitate to buy it for my 13 year olf Grand son if he was interested in magic. Thank you for a great gift that is not a TV or Computer game and it is timeless.
customer_reviews.author: Mam

customer_reviews.title: What a great set! I figured it was going to be ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great set! I figured it was going to be some props and instructions for making sleight of hand look real, but these are actually "how did you do that?" level while still being solid, well engineered and easy for my 7 year old to learn. I am really impressed with the quality and usability. We are having trouble with one trick but haven't watched the video yet. The rest all "worked," were winners and are not obvious, even to a jaded adult. Vastly exceeded my expectations for my 7 year old and even impressive to my 10 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: It allowed me to spend quality time with my 5 & 8 year old grand kids and taking a break from minecraft!
customer_reviews.text: Great first magic kit. It allowed me to spend quality time with my 5 year old granddaughter and my 8 year grandson. Jim followed up on the order to make sure I was satisfied and sent me some extra bonus magic. He replaced at no cost the Zig Zag Pencil trick which my grandson broke accidentally when opening it plus he added some extra bonus magic tricks. The Double Color Changing Handkerchiefs, the Magical Mystery Drawer Box and the Magic Appearing Flower are our favorite tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo M.

customer_reviews.title: The Great Magic Mani steals the show !
customer_reviews.text: Our son wanted to try out for his school’s talent show and really wanted to do magic. He’s never done magic but with this kit , he was a hit ! We loved the directional video on how to present that was attached to this kit as well. This was the first time he performed in front of an audience and absolutely rocked it thanks to the easy magic tricks in this box. This was definitely an awesome purchase that gave us a memory we won’t forget !
customer_reviews.author: Lady Binayan

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to learn tricks
customer_reviews.text: This is a great magic kit. I purchased for my 7 yr old daughter who needed tricks for a talent show. These were simple and easy to learn. It also boosted her confidence and interest. The seller also provides assitional tricks. Highly recommend this product. Update- We had an issue with one of the items, contacted the seller and it was replaced right away and also shared some additional tricks we can use. I order all the time from Amazon and this may be one of the best customer experiences I have had with any seller.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Fun and simple
customer_reviews.text: This is a great magic set. We bought a more expensive kit years ago and it wasn't as fun as this one. The tricks are simple enough that a 4-5 year old can pull them off but my tween likes it too. The additional resources are a nice bonus. Even though there are only a few tricks it keeps getting pulled off the shelf for play.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Simmons

customer_reviews.title: ... as a Christmas gift for my 6 year old Great Nephew. He enjoys the kit and he loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my 6 year old Great Nephew. He enjoys the kit and he loves the Magical Mystery Drawer Box, he was making his small car disappear and reappear most of the day He got the knack of all the tricks quickly. He enjoyed the other tricks also, like the Exploding Dice and the zig zag pencil. The components are well constructed, sturdy and work flawlessly. Who knows maybe he will be another David Copperfield some day. Definitely happy with the quality of the items and with this purchase. Now he's waving his magic wand at me trying to make me disap
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the kids on Christmas.Im trying to get them from using their tablets and phones all the time.Thought what would be kinda old school that you used to play with before all these new electronic games came along.Well took a chance and they loved it.Had the older kids teach the younger ones and it got them all involved.Works for me and they had alot of fun.I recommend this and the kids do too.
customer_reviews.author: D Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my nephew and niece and they both love this kit. They learned tricks and loved performing them for the family. I love that they were excited about reading, learning, and practicing their public speaking skills.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: This Magic Kit is a HIT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this magic kit as a Christmas gift for my 6 year old grandson after he tried to do a little "magic" on his own a few weeks prior. He was super excited when he opened the present and exclaimed "somebody must really know me"! He couldn't wait to learn how to do the magic tricks and show them to his parents and other grandparents . Of course they were amazed at his newly acquired skills! We had a small malfunction on one component and Mr. Stott responded immediately and sent a replacement right away. The service from Mr. Stott is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids LOVED this magic kit!!!
customer_reviews.text: This magic kit was perfect for my five year old son and six year old daughter (they both got their own so they didn't have to share LOL). It was their favorite Christmas gift by far...even more popular than electronics! Our entire family has had so much fun watching them practice and learn new tricks. Everything included in the box is high quality and the book and instructional video make it easy to learn. We HIGHLY RECOMMEND this magic kit for kids!
customer_reviews.author: A. Van Hooser

customer_reviews.title: Made with real children and their capabilities in mind!
customer_reviews.text: Love this as an introductory set with easy-to-learn and impressive magic. It’s a set that has made my grandchildren gain skills and confidence at a level that’s manageable and achievable for their ages (6-9). The ‘colouring book’ is so much fun and I haven’t seen it in any other kit. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: My 6yr old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter on her 6th bday. She absolutely loves it. She was able to do a few tricks right away and then with a little practice she was able to master the others too. They are simple but still pretty fun to do and see. My favorite is the dice trick. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Service!
customer_reviews.text: My child thoroughly enjoys this magic set. It was very appropriate for my 6 year old. One of the tricks was not working properly. I contacted Mr. Stott, and not only did he promptly send us a working trick, but he also included a few extra "goodies" for our inconvenience. Would definitely buy again, and we were definitely impressed with the customer service!
customer_reviews.author: CRG

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this magic kit for my son's 6th birthday and it was an instant hit. It includes all the materials for several great magic tricks as well as easy to follow instructions. Two of the magic tricks were so loved and used so often that they eventually broke. I contracted the seller, Mr. Stott, to see if I could purchase these items individually instead of buying the entire set again and he generously sent them out at no charge along with a couple of extra things for my son to enjoy. I cannot recommend this wonderful magic set or Mr Stott's phenomenal customer service highly enough. This kit makes a great gift and is fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: The Salad Days

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: We searched a long time to find a beginners set for my son, and after looking around, and reading the reviews, it was a no-brainer that we'd order from Mr. Stott! Such a kind and wonderful person, and he's very responsive to any issues you have with the contents of the kit, which I truly appreciate, and find that as time goes on, that little extra customer service is a rare thing. So, definitely 5 stars from us!
customer_reviews.author: Margie R.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't be more pleased with this magic kit. We purchased it for my 5 year old son. He is able to do all the tricks. We watched the instructional video and that was very helpful. They also include a link for a ton of other magic tricks to try which we are looking forward too. On a side note, my 3 year old broke the flower by unraveling it, Jim contacted me and is going to replace the item for my child without even being asked. I would definitely recommend this item. I appreciate the quality of the items and the great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Oden

customer_reviews.title: Real magic tricks
customer_reviews.text: No one in my family expected my 5 yo to actually perform magic on Christmas day, but that's exactly what she did! My parents face when they were genuinely shocked and curious how she "did it." All of the tricks are "built" in a way that anyone can do the trick with success. Great kit for all ages and really fun!
customer_reviews.author: David M. Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful magic kit!
customer_reviews.text: We got this kit for our 7 yr old daughter for Christmas. She loves it! And so does our 6 yr old boy! It has some wonderful tricks, and they're so easy for the kids to perfect. They have so much fun playing with it still. It has a magic coloring book, a magic wand that produces a flower, a multiplying dice, color-changing handkerchiefs, a breaking pencil, a hidden drawer trick, and color changing disks. All easy for the kids to do, but visually exciting for them as well. They've had fun putting on multiple magic shows for family and friends. I highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My six-year-old grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas present to give to my six-year-old grandson who recently learned his first card trick. It was a huge hit and within a matter of minutes, he had learned almost all of the tricks included with the kit. I would definitely recommend this for young magicians!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun & Entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our 10 year old granddaughter, and she absolutely loved it! It's a great combination of tricks that are just challenging enough to make it interesting, but still easy to learn to do them with the clear directions that are provided. She wowed several audiences of family and friends by performing the tricks in this magic kit. Well priced. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AMM

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect First Kit
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be awesome! I appreciated receiving an email from the seller asking me to make sure to open and check the set out. I appreciate that he wants satisfied customers. This is unusual these days. My 5 year old grandson wants this for Christmas so, he shall have it! I love that he can go to the website and see the tricks performed to learn how to do them himself. I expect his older sister and brother will want to try it out as well. Well worth the price for the joy it brings. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Trula

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT FOR YOUNG MAGICIANS; WELL-MADE & EASY TO PLAY WITH; AGE APPROPRIATE
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Jim Stott’s 'My First Magic Kit' for my 5 yr old grandson's birthday party. He was able to perform many of the tricks immediately. Both his 11 yr old cousin and 50 yr old uncle enjoyed performing magical feats with him. The tricks are fun, and the pieces well made. The videos Mr. Stott posted really helped us decide on this particular magic kit. You can tell a lot of thought and care went into this product, and I'm very glad we found it! The sign of a good gift? My grandson is STILL practicing (weeks later).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey for the product
customer_reviews.text: The tricks were easy , fun but quality wasn't great. However there were no sharp corners thankfully. The two colored scarves are too long for a young child and need longer arms to use. The quality of the materials is cheap looking plastic
customer_reviews.author: Dancing Feet

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter......at 5 she found magic. We both had some fun learning it and she will practice for hours......she thinks she is David Copperfield ! Hopefully there are more I can get once she learns how to do these tricks (which I do not think will be too long from now). Highly recommend for any parent whose child shows an interest in magic.........
customer_reviews.author: Joe McCann

customer_reviews.title: Broken pieces after day one.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. My daughter was so excited to receive this magic set but was very disappointed with the material of the products. On day one the pieces started falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5 year old daughter for Christmas. The tricks are fun and easy to learn for her level. One of her favorite tricks broke and we emailed Jim and he sent a new one out right away with another little trick as well. Highly recommend and your kids will enjoy the product because of the ease of learning and performing quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: my 11 yr old loved this set but found it cheaply made and it ...
customer_reviews.text: my 11 yr old loved this set but found it cheaply made and it did not stand up to more than a few sessions of use which was disappointing; for the price, I guess we should have invested in something of better quality to have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: shedoeswell

customer_reviews.title: JUST LOTS OF FUN.
customer_reviews.text: It is so much fun to watch a 4yr old get such enjoyment out of performing his own magic tricks for an audience. Smiles and laughter.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: very poor quality of products. O.K. for 5 year old to play with but certainly won't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Fettish

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Fun
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is having so much fun entertaining all of us with her magic tricks. The tricks are easy to use and do. Two of the items were defective and the seller immediately replaced them. I so appreciate their good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: nikele

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: 6 year old daughter so happy to get this. The main disappearing box is literally the cheapest made item in the world. Broke within ten minutes. HEY JIM, spend like $1 more per set to make it legit. Jim might be a great magician, but a fabulous business man, you pay what you get, absolute junk,.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: loved by our 6 year old Houdini
customer_reviews.text: Nice assortment of tricks that our 6 year old could work his way through with a little help from dad the assistant. He really loved the coloring book trick. I took one star away because the sliding box trick had some mechanical difficulty but after a little filing on it seems to work much better.
customer_reviews.author: nathan m rohda

customer_reviews.title: What Fun!
customer_reviews.text: The 6 year old was able to quickly do some of the magic tricks! It was a big hit with the family at her birthday party!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Robie

customer_reviews.title: Best beginner magic set I have found!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was thrilled to receive this for Christmas. By far, the best quality magic set for beginners I have found. My 7-year-old learned all the tricks in a couple of days, and loves putting on magic shows for the family. High-quality pieces, easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Tara  Lebow Merrell

customer_reviews.title: The Prefect Bag of Tricks!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 12 of these kits and they have been a huge hit! We have a group of kids ages 3-12 who have been using them and having a great time! Jim has wonderful videos that go with the kit that help show how to present each trick. The kids love putting together shows and adding commentary. I've seen them grow in public speaking skills, confidence and creativity. I strongly recommend this product and will be buying his kits again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Young Magicians....This is for you!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 7 year old grandson. My daughter who is 13 has had numerous magic sets and watches YOUTUBE videos for magic tricks all the time. She played with this set with him and said it is a good set for his age level!
customer_reviews.author: Redkiss

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: bought for my grandson's 7th birthday. He loved it! Tricks were easy to perform. Also purchased Jim Stott's Magician's Dress Up Set. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Really good intro magic!
customer_reviews.text: Everything in the kit works really well! My six-year-old was able to figure it out real fast with her dad’s help and my three-year-old even caught on just by observing and was able to do several of the tricks. Really good intro to magic! They both want to do more!
customer_reviews.author: Shaylesa B.

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren loved this!
customer_reviews.text: This gift was such a hit with our grandchildren... they have been playing 'magic show' for hours now!
customer_reviews.author: JoyD

customer_reviews.title: Great for many ages! Fun for parents too
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! Got it for my 11 yr old daughter and she loved it. My toddler can’t stop playing w the magic flower. Had to buy a second one for her. Perfect first magic kit for many ages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing in this magic kit
customer_reviews.text: Well this must be some really good magic because it arrived with nothing in it! Bummer because had ordered it in time to ship to nephew across the country and now it won’t get there in time.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Jim Stott Magic Kit
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased with Jim Stotts kit and I'm a hard to please consumer. But everything was excellent the kit was on time and most important good quality priced write and best of all age appropriate easy to learn and fun .My fear buying a kit was the tricks would be to hard or to boring. This was Not the case at all this is a Great kit for a 6 year old and a young adult .Great Job.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with the company
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my five-year-old grandson and my seven-year-old grandson has overtaken I guess I'll be buying another one, very pleased with the company.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Puntilo

customer_reviews.title: Pleased With The Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for my granddaughter and while I haven't actually seen it in action..I am pleased with how quickly it arrived and it arrived in excellent condition (I removed the factory seal to inspect the contents). It appears to be a nice, no frills magic set which will be perfect for my 5 year old beginning magician. I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gstone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome magic kit!
customer_reviews.text: My kids (ages 5 and 9) absolutely adore this kit. It has many easy-to-master tricks that are sure to wow the crowd. We own several magic kits, and this one is by far the best. To top it off, when the kids lost a crucial element of one of the tricks, Jim Stott immediately sent out a replacement. Buy this kit- you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome first magic kit
customer_reviews.text: The tricks are pretty basic, my six year old son was able to do them easily, he is easily frustrated but really enjoyed all the tricks, especially the exploding dice. Would definitely recommend as a first magic kit.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K Kimura

customer_reviews.title: Magician
customer_reviews.text: Fun kit just needs an adult to help understand the tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really fun set!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something that my 12yr old son could learn a few illusion tricks and this was perfect! Now he’s learned a few things to show to people we know and it’s entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Moser

customer_reviews.title: The tricks are easy to learn and impressive enough that they are extremely ...
customer_reviews.text: I admit, I had my doubts at first but this product is worth it. The tricks are easy to learn and impressive enough that they are extremely entertaining. I bought this set for my 9 year old daughter that expressed an interest in magic and she absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bujas

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to perform!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old picked it up quickly. I’m a Magician myself and this is the first kit I bought my son. I wanted to go with something very basic but the magic included Is actually pretty impressive. This kit is the perfect introduction to the world of magic.
customer_reviews.author: Julius C.

customer_reviews.title: and he would always be so excited followed quickly by frustration and disappointment because he was unable to do them
customer_reviews.text: I have bought my 6 yo magic tricks in the past, and he would always be so excited followed quickly by frustration and disappointment because he was unable to do them. This set has been wonderful for him. He is able to do the tricks, and they really impress his friends. A few even manage to impress his mother. He is also very proud of himself for finally being able to some real magic tricks.
customer_reviews.author: James G Bulford

customer_reviews.title: A top Prize!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this kit as a main prize for our Library summer reading program. The kids are so excited about this. Our theme is Magic and they really want it.
customer_reviews.author: c. Woolsey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old niece adored this kit. It keeps her busy for hours. It is made from quality materials and stands up to the abuses that a 5 year old can deliver. We really liked learning the tricks together. Easy enough to master quickly, but difficult that your child will feel a sense of accomplishment when they've mastered it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old niece and she LOVES it. She is getting familiar enough with some of thr tricks that she sits everyone down and puts on a Magic Show. Seeing how happy this product made her is pricelees and makes this Magic Kit a great value. Thank you Jim Stott!!
customer_reviews.author: andreas bellios

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids (ages 5 and 7) received a different magic kit prior to opening this one on Christmas day. There was no comparison between the two. "My First Magic Kit" is amazing! Simple enough for a 5 year old yet at a level an older child (even adult) can enjoy. I was amazed by the quality and would highly recommend this product for anyone interested in magic!
customer_reviews.author: eensming

customer_reviews.title: Nice collection of tricks
customer_reviews.text: This was my 9 year old grandsons favorite Christmas gift. He really enjoyed figuring out th e tricks, teaching his cousin so she could assist, then performing a show. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: PJTress

customer_reviews.title: One trick was broken
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 8yr son who really wanted to learn the dice trick but unfortunately the dice trick did not work at all. We were missing a dice and the magnet in the lid wasn't strong enough to hold anything. Real shame.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Ross

customer_reviews.title: Box of Magic Tricks is great!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this box of magic for my 6 yr old granddaughter. She was and is thrilled with the variety of tricks that are included. Some of the tricks look a little flimsy, but overall the product is as advertised. I am looking forward to many "Magic Shows".
customer_reviews.author: Bob@Kaylahaus

customer_reviews.title: ... (he was about 7 when we purchased it) really enjoyed the kit
customer_reviews.text: My son (he was about 7 when we purchased it) really enjoyed the kit. There isn't tremendous depth or complexity to the kit, but of course that is what one is aiming for in an initial magic kit for a young kid.
customer_reviews.author: T Roe

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this gift she just turned 3 years old
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Needs considerable supervision for the younger ages. Child I ...
customer_reviews.text: Needs considerable supervision for the younger ages. Child I gave it too just tore it apart. Don't think he ever did a magic trick with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: The concept is good but the boxes fell apart the first day we ...
customer_reviews.text: The concept is good but the boxes fell apart the first day we opened it and are hard to get to stay back together. For the price, I'm disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! My 8 year old son loves
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My 8 year old son loves, loves, loves this. Quality products, easy for him to learn but still leave me wondering how he did it. They are refunding money for shipping it late! I didn't even know they did! Great product, kid loves it, he plans on getting everything from him!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids are having fun but two items broke within days.
customer_reviews.text: Love most of the tricks and items in there but they broke pretty easily. Which mean quality is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: kotomi

customer_reviews.title: ... received this for his 6th birthday and has thoroughly enjoyed playing with it
customer_reviews.text: My son received this for his 6th birthday and has thoroughly enjoyed playing with it. He is able to figure out some of the tricks on his own, but has asked for help on a few- so I think it would be good for older kids as well. My 14 year old daughter enjoyed helping her little brother figure out some of the tricks.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing follow-up directly from Jim Stott
customer_reviews.text: The product was as expected, basic plastic, but instructions for mastery of tricks was great for my 7-year-old son and the direct follow-up from Jim Stott was phenomenal when the box for the pencil trick jammed. My son was ecstatic when a personalized letter followed an email exchange about product replacement. Thanks Jim!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail M Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for young children
customer_reviews.text: Very nice selection of tricks for new devotes of magic. My favorite is the pencil trick, where you seem to break off the center, showing both sides with the center missing, and then restore the whole pencil, which you can pass around for inspection.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M.

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: So cute & like others have said - easy for a child to do on their own without help. My 7 year old loves this.
customer_reviews.author: Rei

customer_reviews.title: As advertised and great for a beginner!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves all the tricks! Easy to learn and replicate over and over! I was impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Judd

customer_reviews.title: First Magic Set is Magic for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought "My First Magic Set" for my 6.5 year old grandson and he loved it. After watching the associated video, and practicing with me, he was able to do all the tricks very well. He gave a presentation to his parents which they enjoyed hugely. The kit is well thought out, has plenty of variety in it, and is easy for small hands to deal with. I recommend it highly. PS The quality of Jim Stott's customer service is also MAGICAL!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Gray

customer_reviews.title: Within 10 minutes of playing with his birthday gift, ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple magic tricks my son was able to learn and perform very easily. A good starter kit for little ones who want to start learning about magic. The customer service to replace broken pieces was top notch, and they even added in bonus items for the inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: A delighted 6 year old! He has enjoyed learning the tricks, some on his own and some with Mum and Dad. He saw a professional magician and knew, from his experience with the MFMK, how the trick was done!. Contact and follow up by the Jim Stott company showed personal interest in product satisfaction and was excellent. A lovely gift for a child. One suggestion - it would be good if a wand could be included in all the kits.
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service and a great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service and a great product. We had some parts missing and when we contacted JIm Scott contact email, we had an immediate response and the parts shipped to us within 3 days! Th product itself is simple to use and yet very clever.My 5 yr old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Andy_Naren

customer_reviews.title: Great for 6 year old boy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my great Nephew's 6th birthday and we had such a great time learning all the tricks. He thought it was AWESOME. He was so surprised he could do it. I was concerned it would be cheap and break but the items are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: LJW from DFW

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect for the first kit
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for the first kit. Not a lot of small pieces to keep track of. Simple tricks that kids can quickly master and amaze their friends with. We liked it so much for the 8 year old we brought the 6 year old cousin one too.
customer_reviews.author: karen eastman

customer_reviews.title: Family fun for three generations!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this magic kit for my grandson’s birthday and not only did he love it so did his Dad. Lots of family fun and entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: SallyG

customer_reviews.title: My First Magic Kit
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this magic kit. He has wanted one for months, so I bought it for him for Christmas and he entertained us throughout the whole day. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Hometown72

customer_reviews.title: Great magic kit for kids and amazing service from Jim!
customer_reviews.text: Great magic kit for kids! My daughters (4 & 6) love it and perform am quite well. The online video (link provided in the kit) was very helpful for the kids to learn the tricks.There was a missing piece in the kit and I contacted Jim who answered right after : not only did he send us the pieces but also lots of extra magic tricks. Very nice and efficient customer service ! We will for sure reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Sophiecat

customer_reviews.title: Great first kit for young children
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my eight year old. He absolutely loved it. Most of the props are plastic, so likely won't last too long or work well for adults showing adults, but for a first kit for kids it is great. Mr. Stott also includes videos explaining how to do the tricks and several bonus pdfs of additional tricks, so lots of opportunity to see how much your kid will like playing with magic tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my son's favorite Christmas gifts (he hasn't stopped performing yet...). He is 4.5 years old and he was able to do a few of the tricks after we walked him through each step, several times. I would recommend this kit for beginners, ages 4.5 through adult (I even have fun doing the tricks). Jim Stott's demonstration video helped me make my decision on which magic set to buy.
customer_reviews.author: sag10

customer_reviews.title: Excellent transaction all around
customer_reviews.text: Excellent simple enough tricks for my 4 year old to perform. Memories that will last for a lifetime. Jim goes above and beyond to provide customer satisfaction. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this kit. Some of the pieces are cheap quality and have broken.
customer_reviews.author: The Bunch Family

customer_reviews.title: but I would recommend it. Good starter set
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it. I wish there was another trick or two I here, but I would recommend it. Good starter set.
customer_reviews.author: happymama

customer_reviews.title: Great for a first kit!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for my son. He especially loved the dice, wand and pencil trick. He is only 6 but this was by far one of his favorite birthday gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Krys

customer_reviews.title: Magician in the house...
customer_reviews.text: Tricks are simple for my five year old and she is having a great time learning how to perform in front of an audience. The follow up and service has been excellent from Jim
customer_reviews.author: Vivek R Pai

customer_reviews.title: very nice man to do business with
customer_reviews.text: very nice man to do business with. he even directs you to secret videos that can be watched with the child to learn tricks. it would have been nice if the videos were on CD so that they could be easier accessed by the child.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Ward

customer_reviews.title: Tricks are easy to do and fascinating!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this kit to my grandchildren. So much fun because the tricks were easy to learn and mind boggling to the audience. Best magic kit ever!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Barnett

customer_reviews.title: It was just perfect for my 6 year old granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Read a lot of online reviews before ordering this kit. It was just perfect for my 6 year old granddaughter. She caught on to the tricks in this kit and loved it. She had to show everyone her magic tricks. She was so excited and so was I. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great tricks for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old nephew had a ball with this magic kit. I would recommend this kit for anyone, any age who loves to perform magic tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie J. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 yr old son's bday. He loves it and is doing tricks already. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lost in Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very cool magic tricks. most tricks are easy enough for my 4 year old son to perform
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for a novice
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old Nephew loves this magic kit! He couldnt wait to show me all of his new tricks. A great gift item for a curious mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Magic Kit For Child
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a 7 or 8 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Boehret

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Magic Kit
customer_reviews.text: I got the magic kit and it is tiny. I didn't even open it. It looked much larger and more impressive on line.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Appropriate for a 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this! It was easy for him to follow the directions. He is 6 years old and perfecting his technique with this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie C.

customer_reviews.title: It was by far one of his favorite Christmas presents
customer_reviews.text: This was a spur of the moment gift that I ordered for our 7 year old. It was by far one of his favorite Christmas presents. He has taken it with him when we travel for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Only issue - the splitting pencil trick came broken. Otherwise my 7 year old daughter loves this and had no issue figuring out all the tricks. Great set!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Kind of wished I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Lieving

product_meta.title: Jim Stott’s 'My First Magic Kit' for Kids, Magic Tricks Set for Girls and Boys, Appearing Flower, Magic Coloring Book, Mystery Box, Color Changing Handkerchiefs, Exploding Dice, and More
feature_bullets: DESIGNED WITH BEGINNERS IN MIND: The kit was specifically designed for kids age five and up so that could they could do the tricks almost immediately and be able to successfully entertain friends and family!

DETAILED EASY TO UNDERSTAND INSTRUCTIONS: In addition to the Instruction Booklet, there is a secret website with video tutorials and hundreds of additional tricks to download in the form of bonus Ebooks.
NINE BONUS MAGIC EBOOKS: There are nine bonus Ebooks included on the Secret Webpage that teach additional magic. Six of the books would cost in excess of $75 if purchased elsewhere.
JIM STOTT PRODUCTS: Jim Stott Magic Kits are copyrighted and trademarked and designed to provide you with the ultimate buying experience.
